desc: At DOTA we roasts and package the best Costa Rican gourmet coffee in the world. You'll have a superior experience consuming our 100% organic and pure Arabica coffee from Costa Rica. We package our coffee beans gourmet whole bean gourmet using three-layered aluminum bags to help maintain their freshness. Pura Vida

layout.text: OVER 900 CO-OP FARMS TO BRING YOU
The Best Taste of Costa Rican Coffee
